meanings.definition: A number that can be divided by another number without a remainder.
meanings.sent1: She bought multiples of the same dress for her wardrobe.
meanings.sent2: The store sells multiples of five in the bulk section.
meanings.sent3: The teacher had multiples of fun teaching the math lesson.
meanings.sent4: His love for music was like multiples of joy filling his heart.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered in multiples of colorful flowers, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: A group of similar items or individuals.
meanings.sent1: The twins were born as multiples, bringing double the joy to the family.
meanings.sent2: She collected multiples of the same toy to complete her set.
meanings.sent3: The team worked together like multiples of gears in a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent4: The forest was filled with multiples of trees, creating a dense canopy above.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was buzzing with multiples of excitement as the students prepared for the field trip.
